solution_line_template: If Louie scored {louie_last_match_goals} goals last night, his brother has scored {brother_multiplier} * {louie_last_match_goals} goals = <<{louie_last_match_goals}*{brother_multiplier}={brother_goals_per_game}>>{brother_goals_per_game} goals in each game

The total number of games Louie's brother has played in is {brother_seasons} seasons * {games_per_season} games/season = <<{brother_seasons}*{games_per_season}={brother_total_games}>>{brother_total_games} games

Louie's brother's total number of goals in the three seasons is {brother_goals_per_game} goals/game * {brother_total_games} games = <<{brother_goals_per_game}*{brother_total_games}={brother_total_goals}>>{brother_total_goals} goals.

Louie's total number of goals this season is {louie_previous_goals} goals + {louie_last_match_goals} goals = <<{louie_previous_goals}+{louie_last_match_goals}={louie_total_goals}>>{louie_total_goals} goals
Together, they have a total of {louie_total_goals} goals + {brother_total_goals} goals = <<{louie_total_goals}+{brother_total_goals}={total_goals_brothers}>>{total_goals_brothers} goals in the team
